mapper.select: select r.r_no, r.s_no ,if(r.r_in<#{start},#{start},r.r_in) as 'r_in' ,if(r.r_out>#{end},#{end},r.r_out) as 'r_out' from reservation r JOIN payaccount pay ON pay.r_no = r.r_no where p_check != 3 AND (r.r_in > #{end} or r.r_out < #{start})=False order by r.s_no,r.r_in;
SELECT reservation.r_no, r_name, r_tel, r_count, r_in, r_out, s_num, si_type FROM reservation JOIN site ON reservation.s_no = site.s_no WHERE r_no = #{rno};
